contentBlocks.title: General Spa Heater Timer Requirements
paragraphs: Spa heater timers must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Spa heater timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa heater timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa heater timers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Spa heater timers must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Spa heater timers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa heater timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa heater timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Spa heater timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa heater timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa heater timers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa heater timers must be installed by a qualified person.
